Title: Fighting in Film vs. Martial Arts
Presenters: Mary Poirier, Douglas Scholl, Douglas Tobin, Keith Martens
Book Description: 'A demonstration of how a fight scene in a movie is blocked out- choreographed- rehearsed- filmed- edited- and finally seen by the audience.'

Title: Western Martial Arts Weaponry Demonstration
Presenters: Matthew William, Jeanine Ecker, Taylor Watkins, Mary Poirier, Douglas Scholl, Michael Spagnolio, Douglas Tobin, Heather Gutterman
Book Description: 'Come see demonstrations in the use of swords- spears- shields- and other western martial arts weapons!'

Title: Western Spear Techniques Workshop
Presenters: Taylor Watkins, Mary Poirier, Douglas Scholl, Michael Spagnolio, Douglas Tobin, Heather Gutterman
Book Description: 'Learn to use a spear! This active workshop focuses on techniques of spear drawn from western historical sources. Come dressed and ready to move. There are a limited number of available spaces for this workshop. You must sign-up ahead in ops.'

Title: Throwing and Catching Practice Swords
Presenters: Matthew William, Jeanine Ecker, Taylor Watkins, Mary Poirier, Douglas Scholl, Douglas Tobin, Heather Gutterman
Book Description: 'Learn to throw and catch swords! There will be a short lesson followed by fun and awesome practice. In consideration of safety- we will be using training weapons. There are a limited number of available spaces for this workshop. You must sign-up ahead in ops.'

Title: Stupendous Jello Shots
Presenters: Caitlynn Poirier, Heather Gutterman, Taylor Watkins, Mary Poirier, Douglas Tobin
Book Description: 'Explore the dark secrets of making the BEST jello shots of all time. We'll share some with you to prove it!. Already know all there is about jello shots? Let's go with 'pfffft!' and come anyway. 21 and over- please.'

Title: The Pudding Shot Technique
Presenters: Caitlynn Poirier, Heather Gutterman, Taylor Watkins, Mary Poirier, Douglas Tobin
Book Description: 'Fluffy- creamy- boozey- delicious-y... We have some lovely recipes to share. Live demo- including proper eating techniques. 21 and over- please. There will be samples.'

Title: Cheese Tastings and Pairings
Presenters: Heather Gutterman, Caitlynn Poirier, Taylor Watkins, Mary Poirier, Douglas Tobin
Book Description: 'Explore the amazing depth of field the cheese world has to offer. Bring eager tastebuds to fully experience the breadth of pairing cheese with other foods.'

Title: Open Source Martial Arts
Presenters: Matthew William, Jeanine Ecker, Taylor Watkins, Mary Poirier, Douglas Scholl, Michael Spagnolio, Douglas Tobin, Heather Gutterman
Book Description: 'Martial artists of all backgrounds join in sharing and learning skills with other martial artists! Please bring any training equipment that you would like to use with you. This will be an open format opportunity for developing new understanding with martial artists of other backgrounds. '

Title: Fighting in the Movies - Chicks That Kick Ass
Presenters: Shannon Marshall, Heather Gutterman, Mary Poirier, Caitlynn Poirier, Eva Galperin
Book Description: 'Ever wonder if the action in films could happen in real life? Join us as we review and discuss some of the top female fighting scenes in cinema. We will watch movie clips and then examine the hand-to-hand techniques- “prop” fighting- and swordsmanship in each clip.'

Title: Western Swordsmanship Workshop
Presenters: Matthew William, Jeanine Ecker, Taylor Watkins, Mary Poirier, Douglas Scholl, Michael Spagnolio, Douglas Tobin, Heather Gutterman
Book Description: 'Learn to use a sword!  In this active workshop you will learn swordsmanship techniques drawn from western historical sources.  Come dressed and ready to move.  There are a limited number of available spaces for this workshop. You must sign-up ahead in ops.'
